comments:
Scrapbook and Xerces/Jaxp to not work.  The same code works in a Junit test or 
in a class file.

I am trying to use the Xerces with JAXP in a Scrapbook.   My environment is 
j2sdk1.4.0_01/Eclipse 2.0.

Using Xerces/Jaxp gives a FactoryConfigurationError Exception.  I have tried 
various combinations of import statements and various Java Build Path 
combinations.
Two examples follow.  First the default crimson compiler is used.  Then I 
change it to use Xerces.

If there is a workaround for this, please post.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------
This works fine - (using default crimson parser)
 Scrapbook Code:
   System.setProperty("jaxp.debug", "true");
   System.out.println("DocumentBuilderFactory = " + System.getProperty
("javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory"));
   DocumentBuilderFactory dbf = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
   return dbf;


   Console output:
       DocumentBuilderFactory = null
       JAXP: loaded from fallback value: 
org.apache.crimson.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
This does not work.  Here I have changed it to use the Xerces parser.
  Scrapbook Code:
	System.setProperty("jaxp.debug", "true");
	System.setProperty
( "javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory","org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBui
lderFactoryImpl" );
	System.out.println("DocumentBuilderFactory = " + System.getProperty
("javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory"));
	DocumentBuilderFactory dbf = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
	return dbf;


   Console Output:
DocumentBuilderFactory = org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl
JAXP: found system propertyorg.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl

This works for me. I created a scrapbook page, in a project "A" which 
has "org.apache.xerces" as required project (build path). I then added an 
import to the snippet page for the 
type "javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory". The snippet ran with no errors 
(running on IBM 1.3.1):

The display result was:

(org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl)
